description: New build live/ work unit, unique architecture in a quiet mews in Brockley.

factsheet.heading: DEEP SPACE
paragraphs:
Featured on Channel 4's Building the Dream with Charlie Luxton, Deep Space is a live work unit compromised of a large glass studio for Eryka Isaak, a glass artist who has been practising for over 30 years.
There is a second flexible studio space incorporating a guest suite, including 'clean' space for photographing artworks and renting to other artists and practitioners as well as Airbnb.
The entire first floor is living accommodation for Eryka and her Sports coach husband, Sam.
Interesting architectural features such as a contemporary roofline, large glazing, floor to ceiling doors, handmade tiles and a terrace make this space unique.
Original artworks throughout, from local artists and Eryka Isaak.
